title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + The Kitchen Sink Coverage of College Athletics
description: Investigative Reporters and Editors discussion on coverage of college athletics, including accessing records, social media, court records, health-code violations, IRS form 990, and more.
